text: The 1937 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles was the eleventh edition of the men's doubles championship. Jimmy McClure and Buddy Blattner won a second successive title after defeating Richard Bergmann and Helmut Goebel in the final by three sets to two. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== -
title: 1937 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles
